SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.NetworkManagement

Class HeartBeatManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.NetworkManagement.HeartBeatManager
public class HeartBeatManager extends Object
This class is used to manage both client-to-server and server-to-client heartbeats. It detects possible network problems and signal them to the "network-interface" it is bound.

  • Constructor Details

    • HeartBeatManager

      public HeartBeatManager(NetworkManagementInterface networkManagementInterface)

  • Method Details

    • heartBeat

      public void heartBeat()
      This method is used by "network-interface" to signal to HeartBeatManager that a new ServerHeartBeatMessage has arrived.

    • runHeartBeatTesterForServer

      private void runHeartBeatTesterForServer()
      This method tests if ServerHeartBeatMessage have arrived correctly. In other words, it tests if in the last ClientSettings.WAIT_BETWEEN_RECONNECTION_TRY_IN_CASE_OF_EXPLICIT_NETWORK_ERROR have arrived at least one ServerHeartBeatMessage

    • sendHeartBeat

      private void sendHeartBeat()
      This method is used to send heartbeats to server periodically.

    • startHeartBeatManager

      public void startHeartBeatManager()
      This method is used to start HeartBeatManager. It starts both heartBeatSenderScheduler and heartBeatChecker ScheduledExecutorService.

    • stopHeartBeatManager

      public void stopHeartBeatManager()
      This method is used to stop HeartBeatManager. It shuts down both heartBeatSenderScheduler and heartBeatChecker ScheduledExecutorService.
